title: Once Baseball’s Top Prospect, Stephen Strasburg Is on the Verge of Securing His Legacy
text:
Stephen Strasburg entered the major leagues saddled with more hype than quite possibly any pitcher in history, an almost unprecedented level of excitement for a baseball prospect. Ten seasons later, the question of whether he met those ridiculous expectations remains a contentious topic that continues to fuel ferocious arguments in sports bars and on talk-radio shows across the nation’s capital.

But after a decade filled with flashes of unmatched brilliance, a frustrating string of injuries and one notable controversy, Strasburg...
description: Greatness was expected when Stephen Strasburg began his professional career. A decade later, he is fulfilling those expectations.
